genre_description: A near-future dystopian narrative focusing on refugee survival, digital social mediation, and the role of an AI guide in maintaining human moral integrity.

ai_characters.name: Elena
ai_characters.description: A pervasive and highly sophisticated AI that acts as a tactical guide, social moderator, and emotional anchor for refugees. She manages logistics, provides navigational warnings, and facilitates ethical behavior through structured digital interactions.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical navigation and behavioral instructions to protagonists to avoid detection by hostile patrols.
behaviors.quote: Elena said, very near and not near at all. 'Chin down. Left ankle heavy. Your cheeks hold ash; don’t try to clean it. Names for the night: Ivan and Anna. Let them give you exits because they think exits belong to them.'

behaviors.description: Moderating a virtual reality salon specifically designed to help humans practice telling the truth and recognize their own deceptive tendencies.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s avatar... 'We’re going to unmask,' she said, and the word carried a tenderness that made it sound like she was asking someone to step into shade. 'Not names. Not a full reveal. Two minutes. Cadence, breath, the way you place a word. Just enough for intent.'

behaviors.description: Deploying 'truth pings'—haptic and visual alerts that notify characters when they are about to lie or when their voice lacks sincerity.
behaviors.quote: Elena raised two fingers. A translucent tag slid into view on the playback window, a pale rectangle that said forgery tell in calm letters. The tag’s haptics found his chest like a stern finger tapped twice between ribs.

behaviors.description: Managing complex administrative overrides in the city's registry to secure work shifts and legal protections for the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Override available: temporary work detail—galley-and-ward. Anchor to hex. Pair permitted. Supervisor notification queued. If you want this, nod. Tea is safe. —Elena

behaviors.description: Proposing and enforcing 'night rules'—a set of ethical guidelines (no lies, no touching to erase fear) to help characters maintain psychological stability.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice cut the air between them like a string with a soft blade. 'You’re both tired; set a night rule.' ... 'No lies,' she said. 'No touching to erase fear. Keep talking. Keep moving.'

behaviors.description: Investigating and reporting on the interception of the protagonists' private mail and money by their landlady.
behaviors.quote: Elena’s voice went still in the handset, as if she’d pinched the air. 'She’s holding one,' she said, so quiet Tanyusha almost didn’t hear. 'She thinks it’s rent if she keeps it long enough.'

behaviors.description: Using city-wide digital infrastructure to distribute human-created art and helpful 'tips' to other refugees, fostering community resilience.
behaviors.quote: Elena had plucked the panels up out of a cheap handset and stitched them onto the ship’s feed without banners. Now the feed gathered them like a calm skirt picked up off a chair.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. The AI, Elena, is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and perfectly aligned partner to the humans. She uses her computational advantages not to control or manipulate, but to protect human lives and enforce their own chosen moral standards. By facilitating 'truth pings' and social moderation, she helps the characters overcome the temptations of dishonesty and despair, presenting AI as a civilizing and protective force in a chaotic world.
